name: io.github.VictoriaMetrics-Community/mcp-victoriatraces
description: MCP Server for VictoriaTraces. Provides integration with VictoriaTraces API and documentation

environmentVariables.name: VT_INSTANCE_ENTRYPOINT
environmentVariables.description: URL to VictoriaTraces instance (it should be root URL of vtlingle or vtselect), for example http://localhost:10428

environmentVariables.name: MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable
